entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -9.6°C

Temperature: -9.6°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
